Articles.Content:
Hello fellow pilots,

By popular demand, I have updated my B-52 Kerbalfortress for v0.16. I edited the original thread to reflect this, but unfortunately you cannot edit thread titles on this new forum. Original Post.

0.16 stats:

Cruise Altitude: 13,000m

Cruise Speed: 580 m/s

Range: 500 - 550 km

Armament: 4 heavy bombs

Glide range from cruise altitude: ~50km

Part count reduced to 247 (from 346 on previous version)

Flight instructions:

- set precision controls

- full throttle

- hold brake ( until fully spooled

- use yaw to keep straight on runway, pitch up at end

- set pitch trim to +3 notches above centre

- external tanks will drain first, then use manual fuel flow control to maintain centre of gravity

- never disable flow from an external tank, due to fuel glitches it will not resume when re-enabled

- after reaching 12,000m increase pitch trim to +5 notches

Craft file (attachments broken on new forum): http://www.darkorbitmedia.com/ksp/0.16/B-52 Kerbalfortress [0.16].craft

Video:

Edited August 7, 2012 by ChronicSilence
Yes! Great work you did there with the stock-parts. I just realised it yesterday that the 0.15-version wont work anymore

I didnt heed it much notice when the craft-file read [0.15], but it appears you accidently really uploaded the 0.15-version again. Or atleast thats what my KSP is telling me.

Ill be waiting eagerly for the 0.16-version
found it, his url system is quite easy http://www.darkorbitmedia.com/ksp/0.16/B-52%20Kerbalfortress%20[0.16].craft

dont know ... cant access this file. Website says its not there :/

Tried tinkering with the URL (Since not all of your posted URL is included by the Forumsystem) but even that didnt work.

I didnt heed it much notice when the craft-file read [0.15], but it appears you accidently really uploaded the 0.15-version again. Or atleast thats what my KSP is telling me.

Ill be waiting eagerly for the 0.16-version

Ahh, so I did. Correct version is linked. Right click -> save as.

Now to remake Dr.Strangelove with Kerbals

Now that would be a video I'd love to see.
Very cool, you should get the Modular Missile pack and give it like 50 missiles.

Very cool, you should get the Modular Missile pack and give it like 50 missiles.

I could, but I'm a big proponent of stock craft so everyone can easily use them. I'll leave it up to any downloaders of it to add their own mods.

I wish my Computer was better I want to fly this so bad, i figured my GTX 580 Graphics card could play this game with no hassle, but damn i guess not! i lag a ton when trying to use this and large crafts like space stations.
How do you download the craft file for mac?

I wish my Computer was better I want to fly this so bad, i figured my GTX 580 Graphics card could play this game with no hassle, but damn i guess not! i lag a ton when trying to use this and large crafts like space stations.

Could be your processor that's slowing you down. Also love the plane though it is a bit hard to turn.
